Title: QTscenarist
Description:
QTscenarist makes it easier for Synfig animation to create Synfig movies.
You can write scenaries and create your movie with it.
It's developed in QT.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
QTscenarist makes it easier for Synfig animation to create Synfig movies.
You can write scenaries and create your movie with it.
It's developed in QT.


Howto:
You write script and open it in SIFscenarist. It creates files and directories to work.
